website_summaries.verdict: Effective eye drops that are sterile and free of preservatives.
pros: Work well in keeping dry eyes comfortable and less inflamed
Individual vials mean less likelihood of bacteria developing
Don't leave residue like some other glycerin lubricant drops

customer_reviews.title: Works better than others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use the drops available at the drug store due to irritation and a terrible change to my sense of taste. I tried all versions of Refresh and Systane. I also tried Similasan. The Oasis drops lubricate better, for a longer period, and the change to my sense of taste is far less.
customer_reviews.author: California girl

customer_reviews.title: Oasis Tears Good For Chronic Dry Eye
customer_reviews.text: Good lubricant for my chronic dry eye. Like the application tubes easier to handle when placing the drops into my eyes. Downside, too much drops remains inside the tubes after use that must be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Enid W. Gangler

customer_reviews.title: These eye drops really, really help with dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have Sjogrens and chronic dry eye diseases. These are the best eye drops on the market. I use them a few times a day everyday and they really help. They are expensive but they work better than anything else for me..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oasis is the Best
customer_reviews.text: These are the drops my eye doctor told me to get after I had LASIK surgery. They're not easy to find and they cost a little more than the other ones that are packaged just like them. I tried those as well as different ones in the bottle, but these are better than any other eye drop I've ever tried. They make my vision clearer and feel natural like my own tears.
customer_reviews.author: TArnold123

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Eye!
customer_reviews.text: These drops are the best for dry eye, and I’ve tried them all. They seem a little thicker than the usual drop but not a gel either. Yes the packaging is wasteful... I use 3 drops in each eye at night and then the next morning I use the leftover in the little ampule, which is enough for 3 more drops in each eye. Be careful though, the end of the dropper can be SHARP, and it will hurt your eye, which I learned the hard way. The packaging is fantastic for travel. I’m going to look for a larger container instead of these little packages and save these for travel or my handbag/gym bag only.
customer_reviews.author: A and S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in the eye long at all
customer_reviews.text: I have EXTREME dry eye, so I spend more on eye drops than I do on rent every month. I can tell you, Bion Tears puts this garbage to shame. It feels almost like water going in your eye, and it gone instantly, so you get SO little moisturizing effect. But at least, the paper packaging is easier to open if your hands are old and numb and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bordeman

customer_reviews.title: No more sting!
customer_reviews.text: While these are exactly what our doctor told us to get, I was so happy to find it in a little bottle instead of these little vials. The bottle is so much easier to use and it lasts quite a long time. As far as the eye drops are concerned, they do make our eyes feel a lot more comfortable. Hubby & I both suffer from "dry eyes" and other drops always seemed to sting...they do not!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Package was tampered with...
customer_reviews.text: This packages arrived in poor condition. The Amazon envelope seemed fine, but the box was opened and torn. I would have sent it back, but I had to have them ASAP and couldn’t wait several more days for a new packages to arrive. I have an eye ulcer and these drops were medically necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops on the market
customer_reviews.text: Better than other eye drops for dry eye. Also convenient individual droppers , great for purse or pocket. the twist off cap is replaceable, but only if at home (not good on the go, it will leak)....the individual droppers have about six drops in them. You can use four drops and save two, but only on a counter or shelf. If you aren't at home, just have to use all six drops at once and dispose of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: sundae

customer_reviews.title: Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have Sjogren's disease and have used many products over the years including prescription drops. I came to a point that nothing worked. I hydrate but that is only half the problem. I had appointments with ophthalmologist and currently go to a optometrist who also suffers from Sjogren's. She is on top of this eye disease and recommended this eye drop solution-Oasis Tears (drops about 3 to 4 x's a day or as needed) along with heated eye pads (1 to 2 x's a day or as needed) and that has worked extremely well. I have stopped going to the ophthalmologist and currently see the Optometrist one time a year. My eyes feel great and I have fewer problems.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My Eye Doc recommended I use this product. It's great! So much better than watery drops. Totally cleans out an eye if you apply it at night after a long day of contact wearing. I have learned, for me, it keeps my eyes moist all day long. I am a repeat customer for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Laubacher

customer_reviews.title: Was highly recommended, but...
customer_reviews.text: These drops were highly recommended by the nurse at my eye doctor’s office but they did not work well for me at all. They did not relieve dry eye symptoms for more than a few minutes, at best. Perhaps they work for others, but compared to another brand that was also recommended and is a little less expensive, these did not seem very effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use confortably
customer_reviews.text: had trouble getting drops in my eye without poking my eye... and in some instances "tears" came out slowly and unevenly. Could be 'user error', but I am going back to Systane for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Seale

customer_reviews.title: Put them in a bottle for ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I think the drops work well, would prefer having them in a travel size bottle. Once you open the tube it can't be recapped, there's usually at least 2 uses in them.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Great! Cap Reseals!
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried these since the preservative free eye drops bottle is on major backorder. Moisturizing drops for chronic dry eye. BONUS: The cap on every dispenser can easily be put back on to use more eye drops safely later on. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: booksmart81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have a dry-eye problem and these drops have been exceptional in helping me combat the condition...they work!!! They must be used daily until a change is noticed.
customer_reviews.author: MERivers

customer_reviews.title: Great drops!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended these by my eye doctor as a post-op lubricant for my eyes. They have worked perfectly and have helped my eye heal as quickly as possible. I haven't noticed any adverse effects from the drops and they make my eye feel so good when it is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other eye lubricants and this works the best. Easy to use individual drop containers so no risk of contaminating the whole bottle. Highly recommend these drops
customer_reviews.author: ScaperGal

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: These drops were first sold to us from the doctors office - he recommended them after my husband tried several kinds and has tear duck plugs also . He has had minimal trouble since using Oasis. as long as he uses them , no discomfort , only when he skips or forgets does he notice symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the store
customer_reviews.text: These are the eye drops by ophthalmologist recommended. If I can even find them in stores, they're still cheaper here (or at the doctor's office).
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye drops
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite eye drops, definitely worth spending the money on them. I also like that they come in individual tubes for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Really like that I don’t have to keep adding drops throughout the day, very long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Erik M Faria

customer_reviews.title: No more dry eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it frist thing in the morning, keeps my eyes from being dry during the day on most days. Sometimes I use it more then once while wearing contacts. Keeps my contacts from drying out and becoming foggy. Also love the fact that I dont have to discard the vile after one use, the cap is made hollow so you can snap it back on! Great design!!!! Will use again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The drops work
customer_reviews.text: I often have painfully dry eyes. These drops work and are conveniently packaged. I have reordered. They are effective.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Oasis dry eye drops
customer_reviews.text: Eye Dr. Recommended oasis brand and they're great. I didn't realize how dry my eyes had been until I started using these drops.
customer_reviews.author: TSharp

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for a reason- it’s the best out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand I have used so far. It’s very moisturizing, and it’s safe to use. It will not destroy your eyelashes once it dries like the Refresh brand. The drops don’t get flaky either, which is great. I just wish it was cheaper, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Use twice a day. Like individual dosage vials. Just signed up for monthly deliver. A conveniebce.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T

customer_reviews.title: Great eye drops for dry eye.
customer_reviews.text: These eye drips work great for my dry eyes. No stinging and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Denna Herman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for after having Lasik
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for after having Lasik. For me personally, these aren’t convenient for long term use. I would waste a lot and go through many.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dry Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: Best dry eye drops. Most leave a film when used and it takes several minutes after use to see clearly again. This one doesn't leave a film on your eyes or create a wait to see good again problem
customer_reviews.author: Gunny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Bottle would be bettee
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be in a small bottle but they are individual and i feel like i just waste it when i cant use everything
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gomez-Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light show in my bedroom. Cat loves playing with the green lights. She ended up breaking my makeup mirror swatting it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: lw

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was told to buy this product by my eye doctor because I have EXTREMELY dry eyes. It does what it says. When I use it helps relieve the dryness of my eyes as it can get very painful. Would totally recommend for anyone with dry eyes. One plus is that it’s a single use so it’s more convenient to keep in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have dry eye and did not want to take medication and this product has been wonderful, it's like giving my eyes a drink
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful for this product!! It has changed my life with my eyes. I have dry eye and did not want to take medication and this product has been wonderful, it's like giving my eyes a drink. It was here in perfect time and packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Maren P. Fochs

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mild to moderate dry eyes for years. This is the only product thus far, that has kept my eyes moist and made wearing my contacts more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put top back on!
customer_reviews.text: The cap is ridiculously hard to put back on after opening it and using it once and there are still more drops which can still be used in the same day. This is my biggest complaint. Otherwise the drops are effective. Fix the tube so it can be closed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Aron

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but miss bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my eyes. Was recommended by my Optometrist, and works perfect for me. Only giving 4 stars due to the individually packaged vials - I wish the manufacturer would got back to selling individual bottles, not once-use vials.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKaren1647

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money. Didn't help my dry eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Clauser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feels like original (the one we bought at Ophthalmologist  office) - not enough oil.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feels like original (the one we bought at Ophthalmologist office) - not enough oil. Will buy from different Seller next time
customer_reviews.author: Entangled Э

customer_reviews.title: Product fine but packaging was screwy.
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be genuine (highly recommended by my ophthalmologist for my severe dry eye). More care should be taken with the packaging. The Oasis box was open and bent. Made me wonder if the product had been tampered with. But the 3 packets inside were still sealed. I may go back to buying it at the doctors office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing. Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: My husband's doctor recommends this for him. I've tried it too, it feels so good in dry eyes. He has special contacts for dry eyes that these drops go into.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Love these drops!
customer_reviews.text: After having lasik surgery these were my go to and life saver for dry eyes. Super moist and the drops are kind of thick in a good way. One drop is such a refreshing layer on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: a&dgar13

customer_reviews.title: recommended these for my dry eye after I used restasis ...
customer_reviews.text: My eye Dr. recommended these for my dry eye after I used restasis for several years with no improvement, unbelievable results these work so well have used them for many years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but helps my itchy eyes during the cold months.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Oasis Tears
customer_reviews.text: It is what my doctor recommends for my dry eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, and not much in a vial. I like the glycerin formula but could never afford to keep up with these.

customer_reviews.title: Oasis eye drops
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, works longer and better than regular eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Culella

customer_reviews.title: Preservative free and eye comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These are for my husband, he was given a sample by eye Doctor and he agrees they are good. I have been using the Tears Plus for over a year and really like them. Also getting them through Amazon is a real money saver compared to the Doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Summer21

customer_reviews.title: Received order in less than two days.
customer_reviews.text: I had cataract surgery and these are recommended by my doctor. This company got them to me in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Connelley fan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Cant live without these! Much cheaper than my doctor charged me!

customer_reviews.title: No preservatives
customer_reviews.text: You can find a better price, but Oasis is a good product

customer_reviews.title: Dislike the Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: These are quite expensive. The drops are fine, but I hate the dispenser. The drops do not come out easily. I will never buy these again. Another brand, Mega 3, is far superior!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oasis Tears...the best
customer_reviews.text: The drips are so hydrating and gentle. Recommend them to patients all the time.

customer_reviews.title: The ease of the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This product comes highly recommended by my eye Dr. I feel the drops help the dry eye problem I have.

customer_reviews.title: This medicine is great and delivered on time.  Good Job.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived broken but the items inside were still in tact and closed tight. I have used it before and it does what is needed to reduce dry eye. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A gentle eye lubricant for irritation from everyday problems.
customer_reviews.text: These really work for my wife. They provide her with relief when things get her eyes irritated.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed this for dry eyes -- however it's a bit pricey!

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops I've ever used. Would like for it to more readily available. Recommend it to anyone that needs or uses drops for dry eyes!

customer_reviews.title: very moist drops
customer_reviews.text: I have used product before, so I was totally satisfyed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dry eye product

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would wish is that it would come in a bottle rather than single-use twist offs.

customer_reviews.title: East order and good price
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand for my mother- she has glaucoma. Most pharmacies don’t carry this brand. Best price in town

customer_reviews.title: Good product works fast in my case
customer_reviews.text: I happen to have a lot of problems ,floaters & dry eyes and these drops give quick relief 4 me.

customer_reviews.title: your promptness is appreciated very much , Thank -you!
customer_reviews.text: Mayo Clinic in Jacksonville Fl recommended I use these for my dry eyes. It helps keeping them moist. I’m glad you carry them

customer_reviews.title: It is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Is a very good product for dry eye it works better than anything I have bought over the counter and prescriptions!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to keep eyes hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten these from my eye doctor after my lasik & needed more. Excellent product to keep eyes hydrated.

customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about the drops is the tube it comes in. It isn't even 1/2 full, and the lid is hard to get off and then get back on. The product is wonderful. I use it to give me relief from my dry eyes. It works for me, better than any other drops I have tried.

product_meta.title: Oasis TEARS Lubricant Eye Drops, One 30 Count Box Sterile Disposable Containers, 0.3ml/0.01 fl oz
feature_bullets: Ingredients: Glycerin (0.2%), Hyaluronan, sodium chloride, sodium phosphate dibasic, sodium phosphate monobasic, water
